nodes.text: The Cilpar APC was an armored vehicle used by independent resistance forces on Cilpar in 4 ABY.

Using tracked wheels rather than repulsorlift technology, it was a low-slung gray-colored vehicle with a dome-like cockpit which had a red viewport. A convoy of these vehicles were used to transport resistance soldiers into battle against the local Moff Boren Tascl, with air cover provided by Rogue Squadron.
The vehicle did not display any signs of carrying any armaments, and the manufacturer is unknown.
